DOC.brief_summary: A first in man clinical trial to asses the the use of am image guided robotic system to safely and effectively create a minimally invasive access tunnel to the middle ear cavity to allow access to the round window for cochlear implant electrode insertion.
DOC.brief_title: Robotic Assisted Cochlear Implantation Feasibility Study
DOC.criteria: Geographically and physically able to attend scheduled evaluations and followup appointments Indicated for cochlear implantation Age 18 years or older Fluent in German or French Sufficient facial recess size ( at least 2.6 mm or at least 0.4 mm safety margin to the facial nerve and chorda tympani) Pregnancy Anatomical malformation of the middle or inner ear or unusual facial nerve course Restricted neck movement (unable to comfortably rotate neck 30 degrees) Lack of compliance with any inclusion criteria
